QuestData.Title: Cauterizing Wounds
QuestData.Description: You have saved my most precious companion, Nisha. I owe you a great debt.$b$bThe Iron Horde lured me away to separate us. I shall not make the same mistake again.$b$bThey have inflicted grievous wounds, and I fear we must cause her even more pain before the healing process can begin.$b$bPlease use a burning log from the nearby fire to cauterize her wounds.$b$bI will hold her down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a Burning Log to cauterize Nisha's wounds.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. Her wounds have closed.
